props.groupBy: Changes which item property should be used for grouping items. Currently only supports a single grouping in the format: `group` or `['group']`. When using an array, only the first element is considered. Can be used with v-model.
props.groupDesc: Changes which direction grouping is done. Can be used with v-model.
props.headers: An array of objects that each describe a header column. See the example below for a definition of all properties.
props.items: The array of items to display.
props.itemsPerPage: Changes how many items per page should be visible. Can be used with v-model.
props.loading: If `true` and no items are provided, then a loading text will be shown.
props.multiSort: If `true` then one can sort on multiple properties.
props.mustSort: If `true` then one can not disable sorting, it will always switch between ascending and descending.
props.page: Current selected page. Can be used with v-model.
props.rounded: Adds a border radius and border spacing to the rows.
props.search: Text input used to filter items.
props.serverItemsLength: Used only when data is provided by a server. Should be set to the total amount of items available on server so that pagination works correctly.
props.sortBy: Changes which item property (or properties) should be used for sort order. Can be used with v-model.
props.sortDesc: Changes which direction sorting is done. Can be used with v-model.

slots.header-&lt;name&gt;: Slot to customize a specific header column.
slots.header-content-&lt;name&gt;: Slot to customize a content of specific header column.
slots.items: Slot to replace the default table `<tbody>` content.
slots.item-&lt;name&gt;: Slot to customize a specific column.
slots.footer: Slot to add a custom footer.
slots.top: Slot to add content above the table.
slots.loading: Defines content for when **loading** is true and no items are provided.
slots.no-data: Defines content for when no items are provided.
slots.no-result: Defines content for when **search** is provided but no results are found.
